description: Nice easy to moderate 7 km hike to Timberland Lake. Hike duration is 1.75 hours at a pace of 4.4 km/h. Very scenic with elevation from 172m to 261m. Also includes a view of Crystal Lake and McKay Lake
directions: From Nanaimo heading south on Hwy 1 turn right at Spruston Road. Follow road approximately 4.3 km to parking lot on the right side.
title: Timberland Lake
